title: Lesson 4: Asking about Cleaning Roles

Preguntar sobre tareas de limpieza es com√∫n en entrevistas de trabajo o cuando se asignan responsabilidades. Algunas preguntas frecuentes son:
- What are your cleaning responsibilities?
- Do you clean offices or houses?

- Do you mop the floors every day?
- Are you responsible for taking out the trash?
